translations: 受福；列福式；（天主教）宣福礼

sentences.sentence: Thousands attended the beatification of Juan Diego.
sentences.translation: 数千人参加了胡安·迪亚哥的宣福仪式。

sentences.sentence: More than a million people descended on Rome to take part in the beatification ceremony of the late Pope John Paul II.
sentences.translation: 一百多万人来到罗马参加为已故教皇保罗二世举行的宣福礼。

sentences.sentence: JOHN PAUL II's beatification on May 1st will be the most exalted ceremony at the Vatican since his funeral six years ago.
sentences.translation: 5月1日，前任教皇约翰·保罗二世宣福礼是自6年前其葬礼至今，梵蒂冈最为盛大的仪式了。
